dumb-touch
==========

SYNOPSIS
--------

   dumb-touch [-v] id [collection]

DESCRIPTION
-----------

dumb-touch sets the last-seen value of a bookmark to the current time.

OPTIONS
-------

-h, --help
   Show an help message.
-v, --verbose
   Be verbose.


SEE ALSO
--------

:doc:`dumb(1) <dumb>`
